AI Assistant - WithAI: Real-Time Answers & Translator

Experience seamless communication with WithAI: your personal AI assistant for real-time answers, translations, and audio capture during interviews, web calls, and more.

AI Assistant - WithAI revolutionizes how you handle real-time communication, making it easier and more efficient than ever before. Whether you're in an important interview, hosting a web call, or navigating multilingual conversations, WithAI provides instant answers and translations to keep you confident and prepared.

How to Use:
1. Click the extension icon to open the sidebar
2. Log in or sign up for an account
3. Click the microphone button and start speaking
4. Get instant AI-powered responses
5. Review your conversation history anytime

Note: This extension requires a free account to use. Each account comes with complimentary tokens to get started.
